Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD improperly refused to admit a document due to non-compliance with Rule 29(4)
Application_Facts: The RPD refused a 1994 summons document solely because it existed before the hearing, ignoring Rule 30's required considerations
Decision_Outcome: The RPD erred in refusing the document and its decision is set aside
Remedy_Requested: Judicial review of the RPD's decision
Court_Ruling: The court allowed the judicial review, invalidating the RPD's decision and ordering reconsideration by a new panel
Claimant_Status: Mr. Khan claimed refugee status based on fearing persecution
Defendant_Behavior: RPD dismissed the claim based on adverse credibility inference due to exclusion of late-submitted document
Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution in country of origin
Legal_Standard: Rule 30 allows late documents if relevant factors are considered, including probative value and reasonable effort
Assessment_Factor: Probative value of the document, reasonable effort to submit earlier
Procedural_Issue: Failure to consider Rule 30 when refusing a late document
Credibility_Assessment: Adverse credibility inference was improperly drawn against Mr. Khan
Application_Basis: Document existed before hearing but was submitted late
Relief_Sought: Redetermination of refugee claim by a new RPD panel
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Document not admitted without assessing relevance or effort
Outcome: Decision set aside, case remitted for redetermination
Harm_Assessment: Adverse credibility finding central to dismissal of claim
Cause_Description: Mr. Khan claimed refugee status based on fearing persecution but faced dismissal of his claim due to alleged lack of credibility
Evidence_Handling: RPD refused to admit the document without applying Rule 30 analysis
Legal_Provision: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA), Rule 29(4), Rule 30
Evidence_Assessment: Failure to assess probative value and reason for late submission
Decision_Rationale: RPD focused only on timing of document, not on Rule 30 factors
Evidentiary_Issues: Exclusion of key document without proper justification under procedural rules
